Description.Text: The bungalow complex is around 2 km from Vico Equense where guests will find the beach, restaurants, bars, nightlife and bus and train station. Sorrento is a 15-minute drive, Pompei and Ercolano are approximately 25 minutes away by car, Naples is roughly 50 minutes and Positano is around an hour's drive. Naples-Capodichino Airport is approximately 45 km from the hotel.

All the bungalows have 2 rooms and feature a TV, private balcony, a kitchenette with fridge and tea and coffee making facilities, and an en suite bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. The bungalows have a minimum of 2 beds and a maximum of 5 beds.

This small slice of paradise extends over grassy grounds of 25,000 mÂ². Formed by natural terraces directly above the sea, the complex offers wonderful views over the Bay of Naples and Capri Island. This peaceful oasis offers its international guests all the modern comforts they need for a wonderful relaxing holiday. The village offers guests an efficient service including a bar, restaurant and pizzeria. The air-conditioned complex features 32 accommodation units and additionally offers a lobby, games room, cafe and a TV lounge.
